short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lock current tab and hide the content of that tab with password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Secure Tab, your ultimate solution for enhancing online privacy and securing sensitive information within your browser. This powerful extension allows you to lock current tab with password protection.

Features 

Tab Locking: Easily lock the current tab with a single click, preventing unauthorized access to its content. Secure Tab acts as a virtual vault for your online activities.

Password Protection: Set a personalized password to safeguard your locked tabs.

User-Friendly Interface: Secure Tab seamlessly integrates into your browser, offering an intuitive and easy-to-use interface


Note: This extension only hide your current tab not all the tabs.

Developer Contact: neerajwork8899@gmail.com
